name: sedn
description: Send money to coiners and no-coiners alike

scripts.lint: yarn lint:sol && yarn lint:ts && yarn prettier:check
scripts.integration:basic:dev: firebase use sedn-staging && GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./integration/credential.sedn-staging.json GCLOUD_PROJECT=sedn-staging FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9099 FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:8080 ENVIRONMENT=dev hardhat test --bail --config hardhat.config.no-api.ts
scripts.integration:basic:staging: firebase use sedn-staging && GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./integration/credential.sedn-staging.json GCLOUD_PROJECT=sedn-staging ENVIRONMENT=staging hardhat test --bail --config hardhat.config.no-api.ts
scripts.integration:basic:prod: firebase use sedn-production && GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./integration/credential.sedn-production.json GCLOUD_PROJECT=sedn-production ENVIRONMENT=prod hardhat test --bail --config hardhat.config.no-api.ts
scripts.integration:dev: firebase use sedn-staging && GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./integration/credential.sedn-staging.json GCLOUD_PROJECT=sedn-staging FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9099 FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:8080 ENVIRONMENT=dev hardhat test --bail --config hardhat.config.with-api.ts
scripts.integration:staging: firebase use sedn-staging && GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./integration/credential.sedn-staging.json GCLOUD_PROJECT=sedn-staging ENVIRONMENT=staging hardhat test --bail --config hardhat.config.with-api.ts
scripts.integration:prod: firebase use sedn-production && GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./integration/credential.sedn-production.json GCLOUD_PROJECT=sedn-production ENVIRONMENT=prod hardhat test --bail --config hardhat.config.with-api.ts
scripts.github:integration:staging: firebase use sedn-staging && GCLOUD_PROJECT=staging-sedn ENVIRONMENT=staging hardhat test --bail --config hardhat.config.with-api.ts
scripts.github:integration:prod: firebase use sedn-production && GCLOUD_PROJECT=sedn-17b18 ENVIRONMENT=prod hardhat test --bail --config hardhat.config.with-api.ts
